resource.name: IS_UK
resource.description: Information system of UK - SIS, WhoIS

attribute.description: DNS domain name of org unit

inbound.name: OrganizationalUnit archetype mapping
inbound.description: Assigns OrganizationalUnit archetype iff id_org != soucast and id_org_nadrizeny > 1

inbound.name: Faculty archetype mapping
inbound.description: Assigns Faculty archetype iff soucast == id_org && id_org_nadrizeny > 1

inbound.name: Vztah mapping
inbound.description: Maps id_org_whois to organization unit according to this relation
